intro: Premna acutata, commonly known as the sharpleaf premna, is a flowering plant native to tropical and subtropical regions of Asia. It is a shrub or small tree that typically grows to a height of 2–5 meters. The plant has opposite, elliptical leaves with serrated edges and produces small, greenish-white flowers in clusters. Its fruit is a capsule that contains numerous small, dark seeds. Premna acutata is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and along stream banks.
